Concentrated
Liquidity

Efficient use of capital – boosts capital efficiency up to 95% compared to traditional AMM models (V2)

Benefits for traders
For traders, concentrated liquidity allows them to trade with lower slippage, as liquidity is more densely packed around specific price ranges, providing better trade execution.
Benefits for Liquidity Providers
For LPs, it means they can allocate their liquidity to specific price ranges where they expect the most trading activity. This strategy increases capital efficiency, allowing LPs to earn higher fees with less capital, as their liquidity is more effectively utilized.

efficiency compared to
